h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: The further back you get, the more enemies you'll encounter, including a strange new aggressive plant that can spin in place or shoot poison projectiles at you. Defeat this Golden Lotus Guai for a good chance to earn a Golden Lotus. You can also encounter a lone Yaksha Patroller in the middle of the field.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Snow-Veiled Trail'.
The content is as follows:
The further back you get, the more enemies you'll encounter, including a strange new aggressive plant that can spin in place or shoot poison projectiles at you. Defeat this Golden Lotus Guai for a good chance to earn a Golden Lotus. You can also encounter a lone Yaksha Patroller in the middle of the field.
